CustomField.description: If checked, the framework will instruct the AI to first ask the user for a simple "yes/no" confirmation in the chat before executing the action. This provides a lightweight safety check for significant actions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the AI will be instructed to ask the user for confirmation in the chat before executing this action. Use for significant but non-critical actions.
CustomField.label: Requires User Confirmation
